mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Quote_Base ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 1;

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(transaction_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d') as challenge_detail_success_date, SUM(transaction_amount) as challenge_detail_success_amount, (50000 - SUM(transaction_amount)) as result_success_amount FROM clink1.Account_History WHERE user_no="00000" AND DATE_FORMAT(transaction_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(now() - INTERVAL 1 DAY, '%Y-%m-%d') AND history_delete_yn LIKE 'n'

SELECT transaction_code as category, SUM(transaction_amount) as categoryAmount FROM clink1.Account_History WHERE DATE_FORMAT(transaction_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(now() - INTERVAL 1 DAY, '%Y-%m-%d') AND history_delete_yn LIKE 'n' GROUP BY transaction_code ORDER BY categoryAmount DESC LIMIT 1;
